title: Police Arrest UHC CEO Shooting Suspect, App Developer Luigi Mangione
author: Dell Cameron
p: Authorities arrested a man in Pennsylvania on Monday who police say is connected to the shooting death of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York City last week.
paywall: Authorities arrested a man in Pennsylvania on Monday who police say is connected to the shooting death of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York City last week.
